Sentence: Warwick and Montague prepare to march to spar again with Margaret's forces, this time bringing the aid of York's other son George's troops
Edward sends Warwick to France to ask for the hand of the king of France's sister, and Margaret goes to France to ask for aid against Edward
In France, Warwick and Margaret arrive at the same time
They receive news that Warwick and Margaret have joined forces
Warwick's surviving supporters, Somerset and Oxford, go to join Margaret's army
